name: Idle Baseball Manager Tycoon
description:
Can you create the world's greatest stadium and the ultimate Baseball team?

Earn money and become an idle tycoon billionaire! Invest in your stadium facilities and increase capacity for your loyal fans to put on a sporting spectacle!

You are the manager, the coach, the owner, the boss! Organise your team and choose who plays in which position. Set your batting order and get your heavy hitters into the game! Set up your team and idle away as they bring in the wins and the cash!

Collect Baseball cards! Each card brings in a new player who can raise your game to the next level! What player will you get next? Can you collect them all?

Use special abilities to give your team the edge in the match! Want to make that ball un-catchable? Use the fireball ability! Need to get rid of a tricky opposition batter? Time for the perfect pitch ability! There's an ability for every situation if you can collect all the special players that have them!
